languages.text: Кибеллу терзает духовный недуг, сбивающий ее с нити Паутины. Дабы не позволить ей окончательно потерять себя, Домин предстоит пройти тропой ее страхов и сомнений — навстречу самой Смерти.

traits.locale_text: Кибеллу терзает духовный недуг, сбивающий ее со стези Анн'шини. Дабы не позволить ей превратиться в лишенного рассудка монстра, Эним предстоит пройти тропой ее страхов и сомнений — навстречу самой Смерти.

languages.text: Kibellah is tormented by a spiritual affliction causing her to stray from the Tenets of the Web. Lest she lose herself completely, the Domin must walk the path of her fear and doubt — toward death itself.
languages.original_text: Кибеллу терзает духовный недуг, сбивающий ее с нити Паутины. Дабы не позволить ей окончательно потерять себя, Домин предстоит пройти тропой ее страхов и сомнений — навстречу самой Смерти.

traits.locale_text: Kibellah is tormented by a spiritual affliction that's making her stray from the way of Ahn'shini. Lest she lose herself completely, the Enim is to walk the path of her fear and doubt — toward Death itself.

Kibellah is tormented by a spiritual affliction that's making her stray from the way of Ahn'shini. Lest she lose herself completely, the Enim is to walk the path of her fear and doubt — toward Death itself.

Kibellah is tormented by a spiritual affliction causing her to stray from the Tenets of the Web. Lest she lose herself completely, the Domin must walk the path of her fear and doubt — toward Death itself.

Kibellah is tormented by a spiritual affliction causing her to stray from the Tenets of the Web. Lest she lose herself completely, the Domin must walk the path of her fear and doubt — toward Death itself.

Kibellah is tormented by a spiritual affliction causing her to stray from the Tenets of the Web. Lest she lose herself completely, the Domin must walk the path of her fear and doubt — toward death itself.

Kibellah is tormented by a spiritual affliction causing her to stray from the Tenets of the Web. Lest she lose herself completely, the Domin must walk the path of her fear and doubt — toward death itself.

languages.text: Kibellah est tourmentée par une affliction spirituelle qui l'amène à s'éloigner des Préceptes de la Toile. Sous peine de la voir s'égarer complètement, {mf|le|la} Domin doit suivre la voie de ses peurs et de ses doutes, jusqu'à la mort en personne.
languages.original_text: Kibellah is tormented by a spiritual affliction causing her to stray from the Tenets of the Web. Lest she lose herself completely, the Domin must walk the path of her fear and doubt — toward death itself.

traits.locale_text: Kibellah est tourmentée par une affliction spirituelle qui l'amène à s'éloigner des Préceptes de la Toile. Sous peine de la voir s'égarer complètement, {mf|le|la} Domin doit suivre la voie de ses peurs et de ses doutes, jusqu'à la mort en personne.

languages.text: Kibellah está atormentada: una aflicción espiritual la está obligando a alejarse de la Doctrina de la Red. Para no perderse por completo, {mf|el|la} Domin debe recorrer el camino de sus miedos y dudas hasta aventurarse en la propia muerte.
languages.original_text: Kibellah is tormented by a spiritual affliction causing her to stray from the Tenets of the Web. Lest she lose herself completely, the Domin must walk the path of her fear and doubt — toward death itself.

traits.locale_text: Kibellah está atormentada: una aflicción espiritual la está obligando a alejarse de la Doctrina de la Red. Para no perderse por completo, {mf|el|la} Domin debe recorrer el camino de sus miedos y dudas hasta aventurarse en la propia muerte.

languages.text: キベラは精神的な苦しみに苛まれ、ウェブの信条から外れてしまう。彼女が完全に自分を見失ってしまわないように、ドミンは彼女の恐怖と疑惑に囚われた道を歩み、死そのものの元へ向かわなければならない。
languages.original_text: Kibellah is tormented by a spiritual affliction causing her to stray from the Tenets of the Web. Lest she lose herself completely, the Domin must walk the path of her fear and doubt — toward death itself.

traits.locale_text: キベラは精神的な苦しみに苛まれ、ウェブの信条から外れてしまう。彼女が完全に自分を見失ってしまわないように、ドミンは彼女の恐怖と疑惑に囚われた道を歩み、死そのものの元へ向かわなければならない。

languages.text: 绮贝菈的精神遭到了痛苦的折磨，慢慢偏离了织血罗网的教义。为了阻止她彻底失去自我，秘者必须踏上她充满恐惧与怀疑的道路，走向死亡的终点。
languages.original_text: Kibellah is tormented by a spiritual affliction causing her to stray from the Tenets of the Web. Lest she lose herself completely, the Domin must walk the path of her fear and doubt — toward death itself.

traits.locale_text: 绮贝菈的精神遭到了痛苦的折磨，慢慢偏离了织血罗网的教义。为了阻止她彻底失去自我，秘者必须踏上她充满恐惧与怀疑的道路，走向死亡的终点。

languages.text: Kibellah wird von einem spirituellen Leiden geplagt, durch das sie sich von den Geboten des Netzes abwendet. Damit sie sich nicht vollständig verirrt, muss {mf|der|die} Domin den Pfad ihrer Ängste und Zweifel beschreiten ... hin zum Tod selbst.
languages.original_text: Kibellah is tormented by a spiritual affliction causing her to stray from the Tenets of the Web. Lest she lose herself completely, the Domin must walk the path of her fear and doubt — toward death itself.

traits.locale_text: Kibellah wird von einem spirituellen Leiden geplagt, durch das sie sich von den Geboten des Netzes abwendet. Damit sie sich nicht vollständig verirrt, muss {mf|der|die} Domin den Pfad ihrer Ängste und Zweifel beschreiten ... hin zum Tod selbst.

languages.text: Kibellah, Ağ'ın İlkeleri'nden sapmasına neden olan ruhani bir ızdırapla boğuşuyor. Domin, kendini tamamen kaybetmesine engel olmak için Kibellah'nın korkuları ve şüpheleriyle döşenerek ölüme uzanan bir yoldan yürümeli.
languages.original_text: Kibellah is tormented by a spiritual affliction causing her to stray from the Tenets of the Web. Lest she lose herself completely, the Domin must walk the path of her fear and doubt — toward death itself.
